columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: collection_occasion_key
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each collection occasion of service activities. The Collection Occasion Key is unique and stable for each collection occasion at the level of the organisation.

columns.name: episode_key
columns.dc:title: Episode Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each PMHC MDS episode. The Episode Key is unique and stable for each episode at the level of the organisation. This key must link to an existing episode within the PMHC MDS.

columns.name: collection_occasion_date
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion - Date
columns.schema:description: The date of the collection occasion.

columns.name: reason_for_collection
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion - Reason
columns.schema:description: The reason for the collection of the service activities on the identified Collection Occasion.

columns.name: collection_occasion_tags
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion - Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the collection occasion.
